price: और हमने उनपर अत्याचार नहीं किया, बल्कि वे स्वयं ही अत्याचारी थे।
arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū humu al-ẓālimīna
